rows.label: qst400303_msg0001
rows.name:
The real problem is the
Perfect Range Sensor.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0002
rows.name: Could we not salvage that, as well?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0003
rows.name:
Don't think I've heard of any
likely spots for those lately...

rows.label: qst400303_msg0004
rows.name:
They're almost impossible to find
except when the Divine Beasts and the Cloud
Sea align in exactly the right way.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0005
rows.name:
And even if we did find a spot where
they might show up, we'd need a
lot of luck to actually bag one.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0006
rows.name:
We don't exactly have time to waste,
so perhaps salvaging isn't the answer...

rows.label: qst400303_msg0007
rows.name: Hey, can I ask you something?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0008
rows.name:
From the looks of it, this young lady
here's a Blade and you're her Driver,
am I right?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0009
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0010
rows.name:
Urk...
I-is that what it looks like?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0011
rows.name:
Wait one moment please!
Boss and Tora also Blade actually!

rows.label: qst400303_msg0012
rows.name: Does that make me the Driver?

rows.label: qst400303_msg0013
rows.name: Surely the Driver would have to be me.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0014
rows.name:
Can we try to be a LITTLE believable
here?! We need to sort out our stories...

rows.label: qst400303_msg0015
rows.name:
Hey now, no need to get your
knickers in a twist.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0016
rows.name: I'm just a regular botanist.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0017
rows.name: Botanist?! Tora would never guessed!

rows.label: qst400303_msg0018
rows.name: I get that a lot.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0019
rows.name:
Thing is, I was heading to Lascham
Island for a spot of fieldwork, but I ran
into a bit of...monster trouble.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0020
rows.name:
I tried asking the Imperial Army
to help me out, but it looks like
they're pretty busy right now.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0021
rows.name:
So I figure if you lot are decent at
fighting, maybe you could take care
of the issue for me.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0022
rows.name:
If you help me out, I might just be
able to spare a Perfect Range Sensor
I've got lying around in storage.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0023
rows.name: Well, that sounds perfect!

rows.label: qst400303_msg0024
rows.name: Yeah. We'll see what we can do!

rows.label: qst400303_msg0025
rows.name:
Lascham Island isn't hard to find.
You can see it to the left as you exit
the city through the main entrance.

rows.label: qst400303_msg0026
rows.name:
Just take care of the Juppen Krabble
you find there. And be careful, they can
be vicious!
